src/low_level/components/TransformComponent.js
setTransform
description:
Set multiple transform information at once. By using this method,
we reduce the cost of automatically updating other transform components inside this class.
This method may be useful for animation processing and so on.

The transform components of these arguments must not be mutually discrepant.
for example. The transform components of matrix argument (translate, rotate/quaternion, scale)
must be equal to translate, rotate, scale, quaternion arguments.
And both rotate and quaternion arguments must be same rotation.
If there is an argument passed with null or undefined, it is interpreted as unchanged.

name: src/low_level/primitives/Arrow.js
src/low_level/primitives/Axis.js
src/low_level/primitives/Cube.js
content:
import GLBoost from '../../globals';
import Geometry from '../../low_level/geometries/Geometry';
import Vector4 from '../../low_level/math/Vector4';
import Vector3 from '../../low_level/math/Vector3';
import Vector2 from '../../low_level/math/Vector2';
import MathClassUtil from '../../low_level/math/MathClassUtil';

export default class Cube extends Geometry {
  constructor(glBoostContext, widthVector, vertexColor) {
    super(glBoostContext);

    // if array, convert to vector[2/3/4]
    widthVector = MathClassUtil.arrayToVector(widthVector);
    vertexColor = MathClassUtil.arrayToVector(vertexColor);

    this._setupVertexData(widthVector.divide(2.0), vertexColor);
  }

  _setupVertexData(widthVector, vertexColor) {
    var indices = [
      3, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3,
      4, 5, 7, 7, 5, 6,
      8, 9, 11, 11, 9, 10,
      15, 13, 12, 14, 13, 15,
      19, 17, 16, 18, 17, 19,
      20, 21, 23, 23, 21, 22
    ];


    var positions = [
      // upper
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // lower
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // front
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // back
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      // right
      new Vector3(widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      // left
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z)
    ];
    var colors = [
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w)
    ];
    var texcoords = [
      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0)
    ];

    var normals = [
      // upper
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      // lower
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      // front
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      // back
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      // right
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      // left
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
    ];

    this.setVerticesData({
      position: positions,
      color: colors,
      normal: normals,
      texcoord: texcoords
    }, [indices]);
  }

}

GLBoost["Cube"] = Cube;

Particle
description:
This Particle class handles particles expressions.
You can define particles behaviors in a custom vertex shader.
These particles are processed in GPU, so this is a very fast solution of particles expressions.

name: constructor
description: This is Particle class's constructor

params.name: centerPointData
params.description: [en] a JSON object consisted of position (by the particle) array and the other data (by the particle) array.

params.name: en
params.description: a JSON which has other vertex attribute arrays you want (by the vertex of quad particle).

params.name: Canvas
params.description: Element which is generation source of WebGL context in current use or String which indicates the Canvas Element in jQuery like query string

content:
{
  "name": "glboost",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "description": "A New WebGL Rendering Library for 3D Graphics Geeks",
  "main": "glboost.js",
  "directories": {
    "example": "examples"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "setup": "cp ./pre-commit ./.git/hooks",
    "build": "npm run setup && npm run build-middle && npx uglify --source-map \"base='./build/',url='glboost.min.js.map'\" -o ./build/glboost.min.js -- ./build/glboost.js && bash versioning.sh",
    "build-middle": "rollup -c src/middle_level/rollup.config.js",
    "test": "jest",
    "esdoc": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "flow": "npx flow",
    "sync-examples": "node scripts/sync-example-codes.js",
    "build-examples": "npm run standalone",
    "standalone": "npm run standalone:custom_shader && npm run standalone:custom_shader_2 && npm run standalone:particles && npm run standalone:multiple_render_targets",
    "standalone:custom_shader": "rollup -c examples/standalone/custom_shader/rollup.config.js",
    "standalone:custom_shader_2": "rollup -c examples/standalone/custom_shader_2/rollup.config.js",
    "standalone:particles": "rollup -c examples/standalone/particles/rollup.config.js",
    "standalone:multiple_render_targets": "rollup -c examples/for_phina/multiple_render_targets/rollup.config.js",
    "start": "http-server -p 3000 -o"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/emadurandal/GLBoost.git"
  },
  "author": "emadurandal",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/emadurandal/GLBoost/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/emadurandal/GLBoost#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-flow": "^6.23.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-flow-type-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "eslint": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^10.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^3.5.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^3.0.1",
    "flow-bin": "^0.78.0",
    "grunt": "^1.0.3",
    "http-server": "^0.10.0",
    "jest": "^23.4.2",
    "rollup": "^0.59.4",
    "rollup-plugin-flow": "^1.1.1",
    "uglify": "^0.1.5"
  },
  "dependencies": {}
}
